name: The Vault
description:
There's a world far beyond what our eyes comprehend, and luckily, somebody has been documenting it all.

See if you can find a login to use, or what feature the Vault may be hiding. See if you can piece the world back together, and figure out what's under the surface of it all.


This game console-based text simulator taking place in its own original world. All information that is accessible requires a decent amount of sluething to discover, but one thread may lead quickly into another.

There are three main windows to take into consideration: the login page, the search page, and the informational pages. You are not expected to create an account while playing this game. Rather, you must use the logins of in-world characters in order to gain a higher clearance.

Different information may be hidden from you based on your clearance level, decided at login. Search terms are also very strict, so it's best to know what you're looking for when trying to uncover something new.

For any questions, information, or bugs to report, please tell us in the Discord:
https://discord.gg/oridont
